::: {.course-landing}
<div class="landing-hero">
  <p class="eyebrow">Private course resources</p>
  <h1>Choose your course to continue</h1>
  <p>Select the course you are enrolled in. You will be forwarded to the login page.</p>
</div>

<div class="course-grid" role="list">
  <button class="course-card" data-course-code="CP322" data-login-path="/login/access.html" role="listitem">
    <span class="course-name">CP322 - Machine Learning</span>
    <span class="course-term">Winter 2026</span>
    <span class="course-description">Undergraduate machine learning offering with weekly applied labs.</span>
    <span class="course-action">Continue ></span>
  </button>

  <button class="course-card" data-course-code="CP421" data-login-path="/login/access.html" role="listitem">
    <span class="course-name">CP421 - Deep Learning</span>
    <span class="course-term">Summer 2026</span>
    <span class="course-description">Advanced topics elective.</span>
    <span class="course-action">Continue ></span>
  </button>
</div>

:::

<style>
.course-landing {
  max-width: 900px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 4rem 1.25rem 6rem;
}

.landing-hero {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

.landing-hero .eyebrow {
  text-transform: uppercase;
  letter-spacing: 0.1em;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: #2563eb;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.course-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(260px, 1fr));
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.course-card {
  border: 1px solid #d4d4d8;
  border-radius: 1rem;
  padding: 1.5rem;
  background: #fff;
  text-align: left;
  box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(15, 23, 42, 0.08);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: transform 150ms ease, box-shadow 150ms ease;
}

.course-card:focus,
.course-card:hover {
  outline: none;
  border-color: #2563eb;
  transform: translateY(-4px);
  box-shadow: 0 15px 35px rgba(37, 99, 235, 0.2);
}

.course-name {
  display: block;
  font-size: 1.15rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #0f172a;
}

.course-term {
  display: block;
  font-size: 0.95rem;
  color: #475569;
  margin-top: 0.35rem;
}

.course-description {
  display: block;
  color: #334155;
  font-size: 0.95rem;
  margin-top: 0.75rem;
  min-height: 3.5rem;
}

.course-action {
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.35rem;
  margin-top: 1rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #2563eb;
}

.helper-text {
  text-align: center;
  margin-top: 2.5rem;
  color: #475569;
}

@media (prefers-color-scheme: dark) {
  .course-landing { color: #e2e8f0; }
  .course-card { background: #0f172a; border-color: #1e293b; box-shadow: none; }
  .course-card:focus,
  .course-card:hover { border-color: #93c5fd; }
  .course-name { color: #f8fafc; }
  .course-term,
  .course-description,
  .helper-text { color: #cbd5f5; }
}
</style>

<script>
(function () {
  const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
  const next = params.get('next') || '/index.html';
  const landingButtons = document.querySelectorAll('[data-login-path]');

  if (!landingButtons.length) {
    return;
  }

  landingButtons.forEach((button) => {
    button.addEventListener('click', () => {
      const targetPath = button.dataset.loginPath || '/login/access.html';
      const courseCode = button.dataset.courseCode || '';

      try {
        const targetUrl = new URL(targetPath, window.location.origin);
        targetUrl.searchParams.set('next', next);
        if (courseCode) {
          targetUrl.searchParams.set('course', courseCode);
        }
        window.location.href = `${targetUrl.pathname}${targetUrl.search}`;
      } catch (error) {
        const search = new URLSearchParams();
        search.set('next', next);
        if (courseCode) {
          search.set('course', courseCode);
        }
        const joiner = targetPath.includes('?') ? '&' : '?';
        window.location.href = `${targetPath}${joiner}${search.toString()}`;
      }
    });
  });
})();
</script>
